divs: sighting detailsit was about 9:00pm 04-12-2013. i was outside with my dog. it was dark so i had a 1600 lumen, led, 5 mode flashlight. i shined it up into the high trees to look at the tops of the trees more than 100 feet above here in the wooded area where we live. i had the flashlight on highest\brightest mode. to my surprise i saw rod like objects about 1\8 inch long & about the thickness of less than a human hair. these tiny objects were reflective & somewhat transparent in appearance & showed up in the beam of my led flashlight on it's highest setting only. on the lower settings & with a regular flashlight i could not see the objects but it appeared to look like a microscopic snow storm of sorts with these objects gently falling in the still air at about the speed of 1\3 the speed of a snowflake. these objects or whatever they were, were mixed in with the dust & i suspect tree pollen since the other objects were round or irregular. there were hundreds if not thousands of these objects in the beam of my light. i walked around our property & saw this at every location i shined the light upward. our trees are pollenating here in the woods at this time of the year so at first i thought "tree pollen" since we can see the yellow pollen on objects like a picnic bench. i looked up pine tree pollen magnified on the internet & this was not what i saw. the pollen looked round & irregular. i then thought since we live in an area where there is gold in the ground & asbestos rock in the area i thought perhaps asbestos particles. i looked up asbestos magnified on the internet & noted many tiny strands that looked like what i saw but perhaps "broken up pieces." we had our doors open that day so i looked into the light beam in our house & saw these "rod shaped things" mixed in with the dust particles but these things reflected light & were all of the same shape. my wife saw the same "particles" in the light beam outside & confirmed what i saw. the strange thing was that all of these particles were somewhat transparent & reflective & about the same size. i went outside tonight 04-13-2013 & shined my led 1600 lumen flashlight into the sky & did not see these particles or objects again. for the past week my wife & myself have had headaches & have felt very tired. i am finally starting to feel better but today my wife complained of tiredness. perhaps this is the pollen. we do not know. over 5 years ago our dog at the time died of lung cancer & had been coughing a lot. i don't know that what i saw has any bearing to anything except of this earth but i thought it worth reporting.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Magalia
There were no other sightings in Magalia on or around April 11th 2013
Summary: 1/8 inch long, less than human hair diameter, reflective objects.
